text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Have you not been keeping up with the coronavirus yourselfs? It doesn't appear that you have bc Trump is doing something about it. 1000000×s more then all Democrat combined and commites like this just proves how out of touch with reality they are. Get out of your fantasy land!
